name: A Light Beneath
description:
A Light Beneath is a simple and short 2D game about trying to escape a network of underwater caves. Explore the cold and darkness as you try to find an exit before it's too late.

Content Warning : While I would not call A Light Beneath a horror game and it doesn't feature any kind of gore, it could be a tense experience to some, and a couple of game events could be considered as "jump-scares".

Made for the Thalassophobia Game Jam.

Controls :

  • Use the arrow keys or the left stick to move
  • Press "space" or the "A" button to use a glowstick
  • Hold "space" or the "A" button to hold a glowstick while swimming (this makes you swim slower)
  • Press "Tab" or the "B" button to pause
